page.title: 10GAMES 2
page.content: {Games Children play at Whitewater {School Continued. If I had to choose a game, it would be either{"Hey Presto"}or{"40 40 in."} How to play{"40 40 in." {"40 40 in"}is like hide and seek. Some one closes there eyes and counts to 40. The rest all run and hide. When you have counted to 40 you go and find the people who have hidden. The people who have hidden try to get to the base, (The starting place) before the person who is "on" (or "it") says "I see you!" The first person to be seen is "on" or "it" in the next game. I like games that include lots of people or if not lots then at least four.
